title: Torsion pendulum - what does the period depend on

content.question: A torsion pendulum consists of a uniform disk, which has a rotational inertia <math alttext="I sub D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub></math> about its center, suspended from a wire, as shown in the figure.
